overview: A Seat-Edge Suspense Cyber Crime Thriller which exposes the dark side of Internet. It explores the dangerous CRIMES on Cyber Underworld(DeepWeb/DarkNet). Directed by a debutant Director "Suresh Leon Rey"" who also acted in a lead role. Music scored by a Swedish Music Director "John Boberg"(Sweden). Produced by Blue Elephant Cinemas.
title: C++
